short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows easy methods to utilize the Teknik Services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows easy methods to utilize the Teknik Services.

- Upload files either by right clicking media or via popup button.

- Paste selected text.

- Shorten URLs

-- Release Notes --

1.0.3:
- Fixed uploads not using CORs.
- Fixed panel updates not occuring if an item was deleted/removed.
- Added tooltips to popup UI. 

1.0.0:
- Initial Publish
